Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class Expression

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Expression
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryExpr, ConstValue, EmptyExpression, FieldExpr, FunctionCallExpr, UnaryExpr, Variable
public abstract class Expression extends AST
Base class for all CPRL expressions.

    • emitBranch

      public void emitBranch(boolean condition, String label) throws CodeGenException
      For Boolean expressions, this method emits the appropriate branch opcode based on the condition. For example, if the expression is a "<" relational expression and the condition is false, then the opcode "BGE" is emitted. The method defined in this class works correctly for most Boolean expressions, but it should be overridden for relational expressions.
      Parameters:
      condition - the condition that determines the branch to be emitted.
      label - the label for the branch destination.
      Throws:
      CodeGenException
